column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Drove all the way from Dallas to Chicago just for this. Had a really high expectations because I've read and heard good things about Chicago pizza. When we got here
column2: we reserved a table for 2 and pre-ordered medium Malnati Chicago Classic deep dish pizza. its good that we waited only for 20 minutes to be seated
column3: but we still have to wait for 35 minutes for the pizza to come even though we have pre-ordered the pizza before. When the pizza came
column4: the cheese was hard and not even half-melted. We told our server
column6: and he was not even trying to do anything about it. Nope. Not going back here again.
